thread.title_full: Save big on Setapp and gain access to more than 240 great Mac apps

author: Cult of Mac Deals
title: Save big on Setapp and gain access to more than 240 great Mac apps
text:
We’ve
been on the Setapp train for years. And the subscription service, which offers hundreds of great Mac apps for one low price, just keeps getting better.
The more than 240 Mac apps in Setapp run the gamut, and you can find the one(s) you need with a simple search. With this special New Year’s promo from Cult of Mac Deals, you can gain access to them all for nearly $50 off the usual price.
Setapp: A world of Mac apps, ad-free
What’s so special about Setapp? It’s been dubbed the “Netflix of Mac apps.” And once you open it, you’ll see why. You’ll find a curated library of more than 240 apps, all aimed at helping Mac users tackle specific tasks at work and home.
This isn’t like an idle stroll through the App Store. For one thing, all these apps are carefully vetted and built with productivity in mind. For another thing, they’re all free once you sign up.
Once you subscribe, simply search for the problem you want to solve and find your perfect Mac app. Setapp offers tools to help you cut down on computer clutter (CleanMyMac X), create custom animations (Hype), sync your calendar events (BusyCal) and more.
Just download the apps you need, and you’ll never worry about ads or in-app purchases.
Save on a one-year subscription to Setapp
Before you buy, use the promo code WINTER15 to get a one-year subscription to the
Setapp Personal Mac Plan for the exclusive price of $72.24 (regularly $119).
Buy from:
Cult of Mac Deals
